Content Delivery.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ConfigurationExpander
    Interface to allow configuration expansion.
    ContentDeliveryConfig
    Content delivery configuration.

    ContentDeliveryRuntime  
    ContentDeliveryRuntimeFactory

    Smooks resource and a target of content delivery.

Package org.smooks.api.delivery Description

Content Delivery.

Package Specification

This package (and sub-packages) define classes for delivering content to the target profile.

  • See DOM Based Content Delivery.
  • See SAX Based Content Delivery.
